#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int check(unsigned long long num,int k)
{       while(num>0)
        {int digit=num%10;
            if(digit==k)
            return 0;
         num=num/10;
         }
         return 1;
}
int main()
{       int test;
        cin>>test;
        while(test--)
        {   unsigned long long towers,i,k=0;
            cin>>towers;
            int dig;
            cin>>dig;

            for(i=1;;i++)
            {   if(check(i,dig))
                 {
                k++;
               // cout<<i<<k<<" ";
                 }
                    if(k>=towers)
                    break;
            }
            cout<<i<<"\n";
            }
            return 0;
 }
